name: Bardic College
description: A vibrant bardic college serves as a center of entertainment, education, and information exchange, offering training in arts and social skills, but the artistic focus can create tension with more practical authorities. The combination of education and entertainment creates unique social dynamics and opportunities for influence.
atmosphere: Strings, voices, and drums create chaotic harmony from every window. Sweet scent of wine and fresh ink fills the air. Bright tapestries and colorful murals cover every wall. Laughter and passionate debates echo through open courtyards. Fingers itch to join the music. Taste of creativity and possibility hangs in air like honey.
